[
    Expression {
        expression: StaticMethodCall {
            target: Identifier(
                SimpleIdentifier(
                    SimpleIdentifier {
                        span: Span(
                            1,
                            7,
                        ),
                        value: "Foo",
                    },
                ),
            ),
            span: Span(
                1,
                10,
            ),
            method: Identifier(
                DynamicIdentifier(
                    DynamicIdentifier {
                        start: Span(
                            1,
                            12,
                        ),
                        expr: LiteralString {
                            span: Span(
                                1,
                                13,
                            ),
                            value: "foo",
                        },
                        end: Span(
                            1,
                            18,
                        ),
                    },
                ),
            ),
            arguments: ArgumentList {
                start: Span(
                    1,
                    19,
                ),
                arguments: [],
                end: Span(
                    1,
                    20,
                ),
            },
        },
        end: Span(
            1,
            21,
        ),
    },
]
